metadata.title: CVE-2015-8750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
libdwarf 20151114 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a debug_abbrev sectionmarked NOBITS in an ELF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8750` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.14.04.1').
